mapper.select: SELECT /* OtherArtistMapper.searchArtistDetail, 아티스트 정보 조회, 오승민/인크로스, 2014-03-05 */ A.ACTY_TYPE ,A.ACTY_YYPRD ,A.ARTIST_ID ,A.ARTIST_NM ,A.BIRTH ,A.CMPS_ARTIST_ID ,A.CMPS_ARTIST_NM ,A.DEBUT_DAY ,A.DEBUT_MUSIC_ID ,A.DEBUT_MUSIC_NM ,A.IMG_FILE_PATH as imagePath ,A.NATY as country , CASE WHEN SSML.STATS_KEY IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS likeYn FROM TB_DP_ARTIST A LEFT JOIN TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS_MBR_LIKE SSML ON SSML.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SSML.STATS_KEY = #{artistId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SSML.STATS_CLSF = 'DP01210003' AND SSML.USER_KEY = #{userKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE A.ARTIST_ID = #{artistId}
